titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2330) to authorize appropriations to the National Science Foundation for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-119.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2330 (National Science Foundation funding).
